head.title: This Club Has a Real Soccer Mom

series.series.name: PULSE: MOTHERS DAY -- GIFTS A MOTHER COULD LOVE

hedline.hl1: This Club Has a Real Soccer Mom

block.p: Meredith Vieira, the morning talk show host and mother of three, has been moonlighting. Last summer she helped found ClubMom, a free-membership organization that provides information and a support network for mothers. The site (clubmom.com) goes online on Tuesday and features a program offering calendars and e-mail; advice on parenting, health and work; and interactive sites where mothers (75 million in the United States) can bond. The group includes the quintessential soccer mom: Carla Overbeck, captain of the United States women's World Cup team and mother of Jackson, 2.
